objects.text:
• Spacious Design with Ample Storage
• Premium Gold Hardware & Charms
• Durable Faux Leather Construction
• Perfect Medium Size for Everyday

Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H
Includes shoulder strap for extra utility

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This elegant banner design showcases a luxury handbag product with a modern and minimal layout. The background features a diagonal gradient split with soft peach and beige tones, enriched by decorative geometric shapes and semi-transparent circular accents for a sophisticated touch. The text block on the left includes a bold, dark brown headline (`heading`), a soft tan tagline (`tagline`), and detailed product features in a muted chocolate shade (`description`). The price (`price`) is prominently displayed in a bright gold tone, followed by a rectangular dark brown call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with white label text (`cta`). Smaller product specifications (`product_details`) appear at the bottom. The right side displays the central product image (`product_image`), placed prominently to attract attention. 

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Beige: `#F5F0EB`
- Warm Peach: `#E8D5C4`
- Gold: `#D4AF37`
- Coffee Brown: `#8B5A2B`
- Soft Tan: `#BF8C60`
- Chocolate Brown: `#6D4C3D`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated handbag in a warm, muted camel brown tone (#A47149), complemented by elegant gold metallic accents (#D4AF37). The camel brown forms the base, offering a rich, earthy warmth that appeals as both neutral and luxurious, while the gold hardware and charms add a polished look that catches the eye. The textures and slight sheen of the materials allow both colors to blend smoothly yet stand out individually. A suitable advertisement palette would include camel brown (#A47149), matte beige (#F5EBDD), ivory (#FFF8F0), and gold (#D4AF37), delivering a clean and upscale feel that enhances the handbag's elegance.
